text: seongseuleoun dal-eun seongseuleoun dallo gal-eumdoemyeo seongseuleoum-eun eungbeolhyeong(eulosseo bohodoem)ila. geuleoni geudaedeul-eul jeog-uijeog-eulo daehan jaga issdamyeon geudaedeul-eul sangdaelo gahan geuui jeog-uijeog haengdong-gwa yusahan geos-eulosseo geuleul jeog-uijeog-eulo daehala. geudaedeul-eun hananim-eul gyeong-oehala. geuligo hananimkkeseoneun gyeong-oehaneun jadeulgwa hamkke hasim-eul alla
